text: Delicious sandwiches! I tried the sausage. Our whole table was happy with our orders. The toppings are so tasty. If you don't like spicy food, ask for no peppers. Friendly staff. Can't wait to come back and try the coffee!
Nourriture épicée, mais bonne.  Ambiance nulle (aucune). Service à la clientèle médiocre.  Restaurant à éviter, voué à fermer sous peu.
The sandwiches are actually decent as well as the prices but the owners are so bloody rude that it's not worth going. Thumbs down
